command_youtube_lista: List the YouTube channels you are following
command_youtube_dejar: Stop receiving notifications from a YouTube channel
command_youtube_id_canal: ID of the YouTube channel to unfollow (use /youtube list to see IDs)
command_youtube_test: Post the latest video from a channel to test
command_youtube_test_id_canal: ID of the YouTube channel to test (use /youtube list to see IDs)

YT_HelpEmb_descripcion: Here you will find information on how to use the YouTube commands.
YT_HelpEmb_Field_Value_1:
1. Go to the YouTube channel in your browser.
2. Right-click on the page and select 'View page source'.
3. Search (Ctrl+F) for `rssUrl` to find the RSS feed URL.
4. Use that URL in the `/youtube seguir` command.
YT_HelpEmb_Field_Value_2:
`/youtube seguir`: Add a channel.
`/youtube lista`: Show followed channels.
`/youtube dejar`: Remove a channel.
`/youtube test`: Post the latest video from a channel to test.
